description: There doesn't appear to be a way to disable the EC2 or OSAPI without modifying code.  Add a flag so one of those APIs can be disabled if they aren't needed.
title: No Flag to Disable EC2 or OSAPI

comments.content: There doesn't appear to be a way to disable the EC2 or OSAPI without modifying code.  Add a flag so one of those APIs can be disabled if they aren't needed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~antonym
